channel.title: Logout command

item.title: Logout command
item.dc:creator: @hotwater hotwater
item.description:
@hotwater wrote:

This is my 474 server.
I made a logout command and it worked but when i logout after i type the command i get this in my server’s run.bat

java.io.IOException: Stream closed. at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.available(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.available(Unknown Source) at Player.preProcessing(Player.java:341) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:21) at Server.main(Server.java:34)

this is my logout command

[code]} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“logout”)) {

			try {
				disconnect();
			} catch (RuntimeException rex) {
			}[/code]

and my client says this after i use the logout command

Error: T1 - 40,119,146 - 0

and when i log back in i see my self before i logged out. here’s a picture of it.

Read full topic
